nodes.text: Toast was a type of food. During the Clone Wars, it was used in a phrase by Anakin Skywalker upon leaving Iego. When a eel of epic proportions engulfed the ship of a bounty hunter on Omereth, Luke Skywalker noted that the ship had been treated like the toast that it resembled.
Toast was first mentioned in "Mystery of a Thousand Moons," an episode of the TV series Star Wars: The Clone Wars, which aired on February 13, 2009.
